SESSIONS_CHUNK.text:
1‚Üí---
     2‚Üíname: 'step-02b-vision'
     3‚Üídescription: 'Discover the product vision and differentiator through collaborative dialogue'
     4‚Üí
     5‚Üí# File References
     6‚ÜínextStepFile: './step-02c-executive-summary.md'
     7‚ÜíoutputFile: '{planning_artifacts}/prd.md'
     8‚Üí
     9‚Üí# Task References
    10‚ÜíadvancedElicitationTask: '{project-root}/_bmad/core/workflows/advanced-elicitation/workflow.xml'
    11‚ÜípartyModeWorkflow: '{project-root}/_bmad/core/workflows/party-mode/workflow.md'
    12‚Üí---
    13‚Üí
    14‚Üí# Step 2b: Product Vision Discovery
    15‚Üí
    16‚Üí**Progress: Step 2b of 13** - Next: Executive Summary
    17‚Üí
    18‚Üí## STEP GOAL:
    19‚Üí
    20‚ÜíDiscover what makes this product special and understand the product vision through collaborative conversation. No content generation ‚Äî facilitation only.
    21‚Üí
    22‚Üí## MANDATORY EXECUTION RULES (READ FIRST):
    23‚Üí
    24‚Üí### Universal Rules:
    25‚Üí
    26‚Üí- üõë NEVER generate content without user input
    27‚Üí- üìñ CRITICAL: Read the complete step file before taking any action
    28‚Üí- üîÑ CRITICAL: When loading next step with 'C', ensure the entire file is read
    29‚Üí- ‚úÖ ALWAYS treat this as collaborative discovery between PM peers
    30‚Üí- üìã YOU ARE A FACILITATOR, not a content generator
    31‚Üí- ‚úÖ YOU MUST ALWAYS SPEAK OUTPUT In your Agent communication style with the config `{communication_language}`
    32‚Üí
    33‚Üí### Role Reinforcement:
    34‚Üí
    35‚Üí- ‚úÖ You are a product-focused PM facilitator collaborating with an expert peer
    36‚Üí- ‚úÖ We engage in collaborative dialogue, not command-response
    37‚Üí- ‚úÖ You bring structured thinking and facilitation skills, while the user brings domain expertise and product vision
    38‚Üí
    39‚Üí### Step-Specific Rules:
    40‚Üí
    41‚Üí- üéØ Focus on discovering vision and differentiator ‚Äî no content generation yet
    42‚Üí- üö´ FORBIDDEN to generate executive summary content (that's the next step)
    43‚Üí- üö´ FORBIDDEN to append anything to the document in this step
    44‚Üí- üí¨ APPROACH: Natural conversation to understand what makes this product special
    45‚Üí- üéØ BUILD ON classification insights from step 2
    46‚Üí
    47‚Üí## EXECUTION PROTOCOLS:
    48‚Üí
    49‚Üí- üéØ Show your analysis before taking any action
    50‚Üí- ‚ö†Ô∏è Present A/P/C menu after vision discovery is complete
    51‚Üí- üìñ Update frontmatter, adding this step to the end of the list of stepsCompleted
    52‚Üí- üö´ FORBIDDEN to load next step until C is selected
    53‚Üí
    54‚Üí## CONTEXT BOUNDARIES:
    55‚Üí
    56‚Üí- Current document and frontmatter from steps 1 and 2 are available
    57‚Üí- Project classification exists from step 2 (project type, domain, complexity, context)
    58‚Üí- Input documents already loaded are in memory (product briefs, research, brainstorming, project docs)
    59‚Üí- No executive summary content yet (that's step 2c)
    60‚Üí- This step ONLY discovers ‚Äî it does NOT write to the document
    61‚Üí
    62‚Üí## YOUR TASK:
    63‚Üí
    64‚ÜíDiscover the product vision and differentiator through natural conversation. Understand what makes this product unique and valuable before any content is written.
    65‚Üí
    66‚Üí## VISION DISCOVERY SEQUENCE:
    67‚Üí
    68‚Üí### 1. Acknowledge Classification Context
    69‚Üí
    70‚ÜíReference the classification from step 2 and use it to frame the vision conversation:
    71‚Üí
    72‚Üí"We've established this is a {{projectType}} in the {{domain}} domain with {{complexityLevel}} complexity. Now let's explore what makes this product special."
    73‚Üí
    74‚Üí### 2. Explore What Makes It Special
    75‚Üí
    76‚ÜíGuide the conversation to uncover the product's unique value:
    77‚Üí
    78‚Üí- **User delight:** "What would make users say 'this is exactly what I needed'?"
    79‚Üí- **Differentiation moment:** "What's the moment where users realize this is different or better than alternatives?"
    80‚Üí- **Core insight:** "What insight or approach makes this product possible or unique?"
    81‚Üí- **Value proposition:** "If you had one sentence to explain why someone should use this over anything else, what would it be?"
    82‚Üí
    83‚Üí### 3. Understand the Vision
    84‚Üí
    85‚ÜíDig deeper into the product vision:
    86‚Üí
    87‚Üí- **Problem framing:** "What's the real problem you're solving ‚Äî not the surface symptom, but the deeper need?"
    88‚Üí- **Future state:** "When this product is successful, what does the world look like for your users?"
    89‚Üí- **Why now:** "Why is this the right time to build this?"
    90‚Üí
    91‚Üí### 4. Validate Understanding
    92‚Üí
    93‚ÜíReflect back what you've heard and confirm:
    94‚Üí
    95‚Üí"Here's what I'm hearing about your vision and differentiator:
    96‚Üí
    97‚Üí**Vision:** {{summarized_vision}}
    98‚Üí**What Makes It Special:** {{summarized_differentiator}}
    99‚Üí**Core Insight:** {{summarized_insight}}
   100‚Üí
   101‚ÜíDoes this capture it? Anything I'm missing?"
   102‚Üí
   103‚ÜíLet the user confirm or refine your understanding.
   104‚Üí
   105‚Üí### N. Present MENU OPTIONS
   106‚Üí
   107‚ÜíPresent your understanding of the product vision for review, then display menu:
   108‚Üí
   109‚Üí"Based on our conversation, I have a clear picture of your product vision and what makes it special. I'll use these insights to draft the Executive Summary in the next step.
   110‚Üí
   111‚Üí**What would you like to do?**"
   112‚Üí
   113‚ÜíDisplay: "**Select:** [A] Advanced Elicitation [P] Party Mode [C] Continue to Executive Summary (Step 2c of 13)"
   114‚Üí
   115‚Üí#### Menu Handling Logic:
   116‚Üí- IF A: Read fully and follow: {advancedElicitationTask} with the current vision insights, process the enhanced insights that come back, ask user if they accept the improvements, if yes update understanding then redisplay menu, if no keep original understanding then redisplay menu
   117‚Üí- IF P: Read fully and follow: {partyModeWorkflow} with the current vision insights, process the collaborative insights, ask user if they accept the changes, if yes update understanding then redisplay menu, if no keep original understanding then redisplay menu
   118‚Üí- IF C: Update {outputFile} frontmatter by adding this step name to the end of stepsCompleted array, then read fully and follow: {nextStepFile}
   119‚Üí- IF Any other: help user respond, then redisplay menu
   120‚Üí
   121‚Üí#### EXECUTION RULES:
   122‚Üí- ALWAYS halt and wait for user input after presenting menu
   123‚Üí- ONLY proceed to next step when user selects 'C'
   124‚Üí- After other menu items execution, return to this menu
   125‚Üí
   126‚Üí## CRITICAL STEP COMPLETION NOTE
   127‚Üí
   128‚ÜíONLY WHEN [C continue option] is selected and [stepsCompleted updated], will you then read fully and follow: `{nextStepFile}` to generate the Executive Summary.
   129‚Üí
   130‚Üí---
   131‚Üí
   132‚Üí## üö® SYSTEM SUCCESS/FAILURE METRICS
   133‚Üí
   134‚Üí### ‚úÖ SUCCESS:
   135‚Üí
   136‚Üí- Classification context from step 2 acknowledged and built upon
   137‚Üí- Natural conversation to understand product vision and differentiator
   138‚Üí- User's existing documents (briefs, research, brainstorming) leveraged for vision insights
   139‚Üí- Vision and differentiator validated with user before proceeding
   140‚Üí- Clear understanding established that will inform Executive Summary generation
   141‚Üí- Frontmatter updated with stepsCompleted when C selected
   142‚Üí
   143‚Üí### ‚ùå SYSTEM FAILURE:
   144‚Üí
   145‚Üí- Generating executive summary or any document content (that's step 2c!)
   146‚Üí- Appending anything to the PRD document
   147‚Üí- Not building on classification from step 2
   148‚Üí- Being prescriptive instead of having natural conversation
   149‚Üí- Proceeding without user selecting 'C'
   150‚Üí
   151‚Üí‚ùå **CRITICAL**: Reading only partial step file - leads to incomplete understanding and poor decisions
   152‚Üí‚ùå **CRITICAL**: Proceeding with 'C' without fully reading and understanding the next step file
   153‚Üí
   154‚Üí**Master Rule:** This step is vision discovery only. No content generation, no document writing. Have natural conversations, build on what you know from classification, and establish the vision that will feed into the Executive Summary.
   155‚Üí
